turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order a coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: There are three Starbucks in the area. Which store do you prefer?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on Rt. 3 in Frederickburg has the best baristas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. What kind of coffee would like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a Caramel Macchiato.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It's Monday so definitely a Grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like that made with almond milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. I like regular milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is that 2% or whole milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll save a few calories and get 2%.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like anything extra in your coffee like whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No whipped cream. I would like a double shot of espresso in it though.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It comes with a caramel topping. Do you want that or should I have them leave it off.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The caramel is the best part. I do want it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: To confirm your order you would like a Grande Caramel Macchiato with 2% milk and a double shot of espresso from the Starbucks on Rt. 3 in Frederickburg. Is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your drink has been ordered and will be ready for pickup at the Rt. 3 location in Fredericksburg. Your receipt will be sent to your phone via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome. Is there anything else I can do for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. That is all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you and have a great morning.
